statusLine.command: printf '%s | %s | %s' "$(ccusage statusline | tr -d '\n')" "$(pwd | sed "s|$HOME|~|" | sed 's|.*/\([^/]*/[^/]*\)$|\1|')" "$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | awk 'BEGIN{staged=0; modified=0; untracked=0} /^M/{staged++} /^.M/{modified++} /^\?\?/{untracked++} END{if(staged+modified+untracked>0) printf "git: %s%s%s", (staged>0?staged"s":""),(modified>0?modified"m":""),(untracked>0?untracked"u":""); else printf "git: clean"}' || printf 'not a git repo')"
